Icons: Add URL to image/icons at var="icon"...
Mobile Browser: Add color in Hex at var="themecolor"...

head.b:template-skin: #layout .container { clear:both; } #layout .header { float:left; display:inline-block; width: 53%; } #layout #header-cart { width: 35%; } #layout #header-ads { width: 94%; clear:both; } #layout .content-wrapper { width:65%; display:inline-block; float:left; } #layout .sidebar-wrapper { width:35%; display:inline-block; float:right; } #layout .footer { width:27%; display:inline-block; float:left; margin:0 1%;} #layout .attribution { clear:both; float:none; width:auto; display:block; } #layout #sitelinks { display:none; } #layout #theme-settings { background-color: #06c; } #layout #theme-plugins { background-color: red; } #layout .attribution, #layout #Attribution1, #layout #Navbar1 { display:block; visibility:visible; } #layout .ads.section { background-color: cyan!important; } #layout .widget .editlink { display:inline-block; padding:4px 12px; margin-right:-10px; margin-bottom:-10px; background-color: #eee; text-transform:uppercase; } #layout .section:before, #layout .footer-wrapper:after {display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout #header:before { content: 'Edit Blog Name or upload image as store logo.'; } #layout #header-cart:before { content: 'Add text at cart and search button.'; } #layout .navbar-collapse:before { content: 'Add links to create main navigation. Use _ before text link to group and auto create navigation dropdown.'; } #layout #slider:before { content: 'Add Image gadget to upload image, add text and caption. Image gadget used here auto construct as a responsive slider.'; } #layout .featured:before { content: 'At any HTML/Javascript gadget add Label in widget body.'; } #layout .main:before { content: 'Edit Sort Labels gadget for Labels to display. Edit text at HTML/Javascript gadget to display at homepage.'; } #layout .page-checkout:before { content: 'Add text and enabled/edit discount alert texts displayed at checkout page.'; } #layout .category:before { content: 'Select labels to auto display posts at category page. /search/label/All'; } #layout .page-contact:before { content: 'Enabled contact form and edit text for contact page.'; } #layout .attribution:before { content: 'Remove or disable Navbar widget.'; } #layout .ads-header:before, #layout .ads-top:before, #layout .ads-bottom:before { content: 'Best for ads and notification display. Leave widget empty or remove to not display.'; } #layout .theme-plugins:before { content: 'Add Google Fonts and Theme Custom Settings/Variables.'; } #layout .footer-wrapper:after { content: 'STORE + THEME PLUGINS USAGES. For performance all javascripts added after contents.'; margin:24px; font-family: Arial;} #layout .theme-js:before { content: 'Add Custom codes and functions here using HTML/Javascript widget.'; } #layout .theme-js { padding-bottom: 40px; } #layout #product-info:before { content: 'Add HTML/Javascript gadget for global product info tabs.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout .ContactForm:before { content: 'Enable Checkout + Contact form by clicking Edit and Save gadget.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout .sidebar:before { content: 'Add, arrange, remove widgets.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; }

div.p: Not 100% satisfied with your item? We offer 30 days free returns, no questions asked.
Pack your item (with its original packaging and tags intact) together with the returns slip into your cutom delivery package. Then simply drop the package off at your nearest Post Office branch.
